document.docAuthor: Nasserzadeh, Hiva, Platia, Giuseppe, Parsi, Farzaneh & Serri, Sayeh
document.masterDocTitle: Three new species, Elathous zagrosensis sp. n., Zorochros dilatatus sp. n., and Dicronychus iranicus sp. n., and noteworthy records of click beetles from western Iran (Coleoptera: Elateridae)
